get.summary: Get Ec POIs by Bounding Box and Type
get.description: Returns a list of Eco POIs within the specified bounding box and of the specified type

parameters.name: bounding_box
parameters.description: Bounding box in 'minLng,minLat,maxLng,maxLat' format

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the POIs to retrieve: R for relation, W for way, N for node

200.description: Successful operation

get.summary: Get EcPOIs in a 1km buffer from the HikingRoutes defined by ID
get.description: Returns a list of Ec POIs around 1km from a specific OSM2CAI hiking route ID and of a specified type

parameters.name: hr_osm2cai_id
parameters.description: OSM2CAI ID of the hiking route

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the POIs to retrieve

200.description: Successful operation

get.summary: Get EcPOIs in a 1km buffer from the HikingRoutes defined by OSM ID
get.description: Returns a list of Ec POIs around 1km from a specific OSM hiking route ID and of a specified type

parameters.name: hr_osm_id
parameters.description: OSM ID of the hiking route

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the POIs to retrieve

200.description: Successful operation
List of hiking routes

parameters.name: region_code
parameters.description:
Regione code according to CAI convention:

A -> Friuli Venezia Giulia
B -> Veneto
C -> Trentino Alto Adige
D -> Lombardia
E -> Piemonte
F -> Val d'Aosta
G -> Liguria
H -> Emilia Romagna
L -> Toscana
M -> Marche
N -> Umbria
O -> Lazio
P -> Abruzzo
Q -> Molise
S -> Campania
R -> Puglia
T -> Basilicata
U -> Calabria
V -> Sicilia
Z -> Sardegna

parameters.name: sda
parameters.description: SDA (stato di accatastamento) (e.g. 0,1,2,3,4). SDA=3 means ready to be validated, SDA=4 means validated by CAI expert

200.description:
Returns all the hiking routes OSM2CAI IDs based on the given region code and SDA number.
     *                       These ids can be used in the geojson API hiking-route

parameters.name: bounding_box
parameters.description: List of WGS84 lat,lon cordinates in this order(xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax)

parameters.name: sda
parameters.description: SDA (stato di accatastamento) (e.g. 0,1,2,3,4). SDA=3 means ready to be validated, SDA=4 means validated by CAI expert

200.description:
Returns all the hiking routes OSM2CAI IDs based on the given bounding box coordinates( xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax)  and SDA number.
     *                       These ids can be used in the geojson API hiking-route

parameters.description:
Regione code according to CAI convention:

A -> Friuli Venezia Giulia
B -> Veneto

parameters.name: sda
parameters.description: SDA (stato di accatastamento) (e.g. 3 or 3,1 or 0,1,2). SDA=3 means ready to be validated, SDA=4 means validated by CAI expert

200.description:
Returns all the hiking routes OSM IDs based on the given region code and SDA number.
     *                       OSMID can be used in hiking-route-osm API or directly in OpenStreetMap relation by the following URL:
     *                       https://openstreetmap.org/relation/{OSMID}. Remember that the data on OSM can be differente from data in
     *                       OSM2CAI after validation.

parameters.name: bounding_box
parameters.description: List of WGS84 lat,lon cordinates in this order(xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax)

parameters.name: sda
parameters.description: SDA (stato di accatastamento) (e.g. 3 or 3,1 or 0,1,2). SDA=3 means ready to be validated, SDA=4 means validated by CAI expert

200.description:
Returns all the hiking routes OSM IDs based on the given bounding box coordinates( xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax)  and SDA number.
     *                       These ids can be used in the geojson API hiking-route

parameters.name: sda
parameters.description: SDA (stato di accatastamento) (e.g. 0,1,2,3,4). SDA=3 means ready to be validated, SDA=4 means validated by CAI expert

200.description: Returns all the feautures collection based on the given bounding box coordinates( xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax)  and SDA number.
Returns the geojson of a Hiking Route based on the given OSM2CAI ID.

source.description: from SDA=3 and over must be survey:CAI or other values accepted by CAI as valid source

cai_scale.description: CAI scale difficulty: T E EE

ref.description: local ref hiking route number must be three number and a letter only in last position for variants

public_page.description: public url for the hiking route

issues_last_update.description: date of last update of the issues format YYYY-mm-dd

updated_at.description: date of last update of the hiking route format YYYY-mm-dd H:i:s

validation_date.description: date of validation of the hiking route, visible only for sda = 4 format YYYY-mm-dd

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The OSM2CAI ID of a specific Hiking Route

200.description: Returns the TDH format geojson of a Hiking Route based on the given ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The OSM relation ID of a specific Hiking Route (e.g. 13442719)

200.description: Returns the geojson of a Hiking Route based on the given OSM ID.

source.description: from SDA=3 and over must be survey:CAI or other values accepted by CAI as valid source

cai_scale.description: CAI scale difficulty: T E EE

ref.description: local ref hiking route number must be three number and a letter only in last position for variants

public_page.description: public url for the hiking route

validation_date.description: date of validation of the hiking route, visible only for sda = 4 format YYYY-mm-dd

updated_at.description: date of last update of the hiking route format YYYY-mm-dd H:i:s

200.description: Returns all the itinerary IDs and updated_at date. These ids can be used in the json API to retrieve the itinerary data.

get.description: Returns a list of all regions with their ID and last updated timestamp. The update timestamp of an item in the database is formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD-Thh:mm:ss+HH:M', adhering to the ISO8601 standard. This notation represents the date and time with an offset of hours (HH) and minutes (MM) from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), ensuring a consistent formatting and interpretation across the globe.

200.description: Successful operation

updated_at.description: Last update timestamp of the region

get.description: Returns a single region, including mountain groups and region geometry, by ID. The update timestamp of an item in the database is formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD-Thh:mm:ss+HH:M', adhering to the ISO8601 standard. This notation represents the date and time with an offset of hours (HH) and minutes (MM) from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), ensuring a consistent formatting and interpretation across the globe.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the region to return

200.description: Successful operation

items.description: The images url of the section

get.description: Returns a single mountain group, including hiking routes, huts, pois, and sections that intersect with the mountain group geometry. The update timestamp of an item in the database is formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD-Thh:mm:ss+HH:M', adhering to the ISO8601 standard. This notation represents the date and time with an offset of hours (HH) and minutes (MM) from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), ensuring a consistent formatting and interpretation across the globe.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the mountain group to return

200.description: Successful operation

items.description: The section IDs associated with the mountain group

area.description: The area of the mountain group

ele_min.description: The minimum elevation of the mountain group

ele_max.description: The maximum elevation of the mountain group

ele_avg.description: The average elevation of the mountain group

ele_stdev.description: The standard deviation  of the mountain group's elevation

slope_min.description: The minimum slope of the mountain group

slope_max.description: The maximum slope of the mountain group

slope_avg.description: The average slope of the mountain group

slope_stdev.description: The standard deviation of the mountain group's slope

region.description: The region of the mountain group

provinces.description: The provinces of the mountain group

municipalities.description: The municipalities of the mountain group

map.description: The map of the mountain group

description.description: The description of the mountain group

aggregated_data.description: The aggregated data of the mountain group

protected_area.description: The protected area of the mountain group

activity.description: The activity of the mountain group

hiking_routes.description: The hiking routes intersecting with the mountain group

items.description: The EC POIs intersecting with the mountain group
The CAI huts intersecting with the mountain group

hiking_routes_map.description: The map of the hiking routes

disclaimer.description: The disclaimer of the mountain group

ec_pois_count.description: The count of EC POIs intersecting with the mountain group

cai_huts_count.description: The count of CAI huts intersecting with the mountain group

items.description: The images url of the section

get.description: Returns a single hiking route, including cai_huts and pois that intersect with the hiking route geometry. The update timestamp of an item in the database is formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD-Thh:mm:ss+HH:M', adhering to the ISO8601 standard. This notation represents the date and time with an offset of hours (HH) and minutes (MM) from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), ensuring a consistent formatting and interpretation across the globe.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the hiking route to return

200.description: Successful operation

items.description: The section IDs associated with the hiking route

from.description: The starting point of the hiking route

from:coordinate.description: The coordinates of the starting point of the hiking route

to.description: The ending point of the hiking route

to:coordinate.description: The coordinates of the ending point of the hiking route

abstract.description: The abstract of the hiking route

distance.description: The distance of the hiking route

duration_forward.description: The forward duration of the hiking route

ele_max.description: The maximum elevation of the hiking route

ele_min.description: The minimum elevation of the hiking route

incline.description: The incline of the hiking route

issues_status.description: The issues status of the hiking route

symbol.description: The symbol of the hiking route

difficulty.description: The difficulty of the hiking route

info.description: The information of the hiking route
info.example: Sezioni del Club Alpino Italiano, Guide Alpine o Guide Ambientali Escursionistiche

items.description: The CAI huts intersecting with the hiking route
The POIs intersecting with the hiking route

activity.description: The activity of the hiking route

map.description: The map of the hiking route

items.description: The images url of the section

properties.name: Sentiero 1
properties.info: Sezioni del Club Alpino Italiano, Guide Alpine o Guide Ambientali Escursionistiche

get.description: Returns a single hut by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the hut to return

200.description: Successful operation

mountain_groups.description: The mountain groups associated with the hut

type_custodial.description: The type custodial of the hut

company_management_property.description: The company management property of the hut

addr:street.description: The street address of the hut

addr:housenumber.description: The house number of the hut

ref:vatin.description: The VATIN reference of the hut

phone.description: The phone number of the hut

fax.description: The fax number of the hut

email_pec.description: The PEC email of the hut

facebook_contact.description: The facebook contact of the hut

source:ref.description: The source reference of the hut

items.description: The POIs intersecting with the hut

opening.description: The opening hours of the hut

acqua_in_rifugio_service.description: The water in the hut service. Possible values: 0, 1 where 0 = no and 1 = yes

acqua_calda_service.description: The hot water service. Possible values: 0, 1 where 0 = no and 1 = yes

acqua_esterno_service.description: The external water service. Possible values: 0, 1 where 0 = no and 1 = yes

ristorante_service.description: The restaurant service. Possible values: 0, 1 where 0 = no and 1 = yes

necessary_equipment.description: The necessary equipment of the hut
necessary_equipment.example: Normale dotazione Escursionistica / Normale dotazione Alpinistica

payment_credit_cards.description: The payment credit cards service. Possible values: 0, 1 where 0 = no and 1 = yes

items.description: The hiking routes intersecting with the hut

accessibilitá_ai_disabili_service.description: The accessibility to disabled service. Possible values: 0, 1 where 0 = no and 1 = yes

items.description: The images url of the section

200.description: Successful operation
